about_the_game:
The Mysterious Man has visited Portia once again! The eccentric businessman spends his time travelling the world while collecting fashionable clothes from different cities. During his recent visit to Portia, he decided to gift several residents new, top of the line, trendy outfits!

In this pack you will receive an alternative outfit for each of the following in-game NPCs:

  • Arlo
  • Dr Xu
  • Emily
  • Ginger
  • Gust
  • Mint
  • Phyllis
  • Sam
